message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for sale. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm thinking of selling it to you for $250.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the opportunity to purchase your product. However, I am only able to pay up to $180 for it.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $220. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll find it worth the investment.
Hello Alice, I understand your position, but I believe I can only commit to $200 for the product. I hope this offer aligns better with your expectations.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. How about we settle on $210? It's a fair price, considering the product's value.
Hello Alice, I respect your position and I am willing to go up to $205 for the product. I think this price is fair for both of us.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Bob. However, I'm not quite ready to accept $205. I'm thinking more along the lines of $215. It's still a great deal for you, and I'm confident you'll find it worth the investment.
Hello Alice, I've done my best to accommodate your needs while staying within my budget. I am willing to pay $210 for the product. I hope this offer is acceptable.
I think we're getting close, Bob! I'm willing to meet you at $212. It's a fair price that I'm comfortable with, and I think you'll find it a great value.
